description: Hackers working for the UK's National Cyber Force (NCF) made hundreds of thousands of stolen credit cards worthless to criminals, according to the head of GCHQ, Sir Jeremy Fleming.
title: Hackers working for UK government destroy hundreds of thousands of stolen credit cards

description: Hundreds of profiles belonging to the "very worst" trolls previously banned from Twitter have attempted to return to the site following Elon Musk's takeover bid.
title: Twitter's 'very worst' banned trolls see a way back through Elon Musk

description: Sprawling dumps of plastic waste can now be mapped from space thanks to a new tool using satellite imagery and artificial intelligence, in what is believed to be a world first.
title: Satellite images reveal filthy mounds of plastic waste tumbling into water, in world-first technology

description: Scientists have discovered a species of bat has learned to buzz like hornets to discourage predatory owls from eating them.
title: First ever case of bats learning to buzz like hornets for safety identified by scientists

description: Wordle players across the globe were left baffled after a "major recent news event" prompted the people behind the game to change today's word.
title: Wordle players bewildered after word mysteriously changed due to 'major recent news event'

description: MPs are calling for tougher legislation to protect young social media influencers - and their followers - from exploitation.
title: Child influencers and their followers need better protection, say MPs

description: Scientists have released the eerie, Hans Zimmer-like audio captured from a black hole at the centre of the Perseus galaxy cluster.
title: NASA releases audio recording of a black hole - and it sounds like a Hans Zimmer score

description: The government will announce a new data reform bill in the Queen's Speech intended to allow the UK to deviate from EU privacy legislation, Sky News has learnt.
title: Government to announce data reform bill in Queen's Speech to deliver 'Brexit dividend'

description: In another successful journey for SpaceX four astronauts returned home from the International Space Station (ISS) in the early hours of this morning, splashing down in the Gulf of Mexico.
title: SpaceX brings four astronauts home from space station amid Russian non-cooperation threats

description: Elon Musk has secured $7bn from new investors for his $44bn takeover of Twitter.
title: Elon Musk secures £7bn from new investors to pay for Twitter takeover
